System Components

Titan Power Pack Ecosystem

Modular components that work together to create your perfect power solution.

üîã

Titan Base Station

3.6kW power (expandable to 7.2kW)
3kWh storage (expandable to 15kWh)
2400W solar input with 3 MPPT trackers
16 output ports, 20ms UPS switching

‚ûï

Titan Expansion Pack

3kWh additional storage
Add up to 4 packs per base (15kWh total)
Can be used as standalone 48V DC pack
Flexible charging options
